section.heading: Conditions of enrollment.
section.text: All pertinent University rules and regulations, including, but not limited to, those relating to admission standards, shall apply to applicants for admission and to students already enrolled who are eligible for the tuition grant program outlined in § 38-1207.02.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Feb. 18, 1988, D.C. Law 7-74, § 2, 34 DCR 7946
